panels.title: Some instances read too slow (Get + Coprocessor)?
Latch wait too long (incorrectly included scheduler-wait-duration now) ?
Too many compaction pending bytes accumulating ?
Some instances' KVDB compaction pending bytes accumulating ?
PD has too many scheduling operators ?
PD client has a lot pending tasks ?

targets.expr: 1 - sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", type="store_available"}) by (store) / sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", type="store_capacity"}) by (store)

panels.title: Some instances' CPU usage have jitter ?
Wait for available scheduler threads (no use now) ?

targets.expr: sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="flush_write_bytes"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="bytes_written"}[1m]))

panels.title: KVDB compaction flow has jitter? (read-flow may hit page-cache)

targets.expr: sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="flush_write_bytes"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="bytes_written"}[1m]))

panels.title: RaftDB compaction flow has jitter ? (read-flow may hit page-cache)

targets.expr: sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="flush_write_bytes"}[1m])) by (instance) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="bytes_written"}[1m])) by (instance) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="bytes_read"}[1m])) by(instance)

panels.title: Some instances' KVDB compaction flow has jitter ?

targets.expr: sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="bytes_read"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="iter_bytes_read"}[1m]))

panels.title: RaftDB frontend flow has jitter ? (read-flow may hit page-cache)

targets.expr: sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="bytes_read"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="iter_bytes_read"}[1m]))

panels.title: KVDB frontend flow has jitter ? (read-flow may hit page-cache)

targets.expr: sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="flush_write_bytes"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="flush_write_bytes"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="bytes_written"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="bytes_written"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="wal_file_bytes"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="wal_file_bytes"}[1m]))

sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="bytes_read"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="bytes_read"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="bytes_read"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="bytes_read"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="iter_bytes_read"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="iter_bytes_read"}[1m]))

panels.title: Total IO flow has jitter ? (read-flow may hit page-cache)

targets.expr: sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="flush_write_bytes"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="flush_write_bytes"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="bytes_written"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="bytes_written"}[1m]))

sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="bytes_read"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_compaction_flow_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="raft", type="bytes_read"}[1m]))

panels.title: Total compaction flow has jitter ? (read-flow may hit page-cache)

targets.expr: (sum(rate(tikv_coprocessor_scan_details{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", req=~"select|index", cf="default"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_coprocessor_scan_details{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", req=~"select|index", cf="write"}[1m])))

panels.title: KVDB scan too much deleted data  ?
Too much get-request fall to raftstore ?

targets.expr: sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="kv", type="block_cache_data_miss"}[1m])) / (sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", db="kv", type="block_cache_data_hit"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", db="kv", type="block_cache_data_miss"}[1m])))
